Reviews.Title: “Love staying at Lynina Inn”
Reviews.Author: Cterral
Reviews.Content: We have stayed here many times and it is the same every time. Super clean rooms, friendly & helpful staff, convenient location and you can't beat the price. There is always a hot breakfast that includes fresh made waffles. We love staying here and will return.

Reviews.Title: “Lynina Inn - GREAT PLACE”
Reviews.Author: james a
Reviews.Content: Great Place !! Very nice folks and exceptionally clean!! Great Bargain. Greeted by professional attendant about 10pm and the office area was clean and neat. The room was exceptionally clean and the bed professionally made. The bed mattress was great! - no cheapy. The property was well lighted and appeared to be a safe area. The motel owner are likely Christian and the Bible verse provided in the room along with the Bible was very heart warming. The continental breakfast was great and again, the folks at Lynina Inn were great and the entire facility was very clean. Lynina Inn will be my first choice any time i'm in the Branson area.

Reviews.Title: “Great Value and Very Clean”
Reviews.Author: Sooner-explorer
Reviews.Content: We've just returned from our second time to stay at the Lynina Inn. For the price, cleanliness, friendly staff and features, it cannot be beat. Location is convenient to Branson activities and breakfast is included in the price (includes eggs, cereal, bisuits, yogurt, fruit, and juice/coffee). The beds were comfortable and my kids liked the small pool at the front of the property. The mini-fridge in the room was a nice feature, as well. Next time we stay here, I will probably bring my own pillow since I like to have an extra. My only suggestion would be that the rooms could use a little update -- perhaps new bedding with sheets covering both sides of the comforter like you see in newer hotels. However, for the price, location, and breakfast...this is a great place to stay and we will probably do so again.

Reviews.Title: “Can't be beat!”
Reviews.Author: Beachfam98
Reviews.Content: Our family just returned from a short stay in Branson. This was our second time staying at the Lynina Inn, last year having been our first. We absolutely LOVE THIS PLACE! Super clean, super location - close enough to everything without being right in the middle of the congestion, great employees that are extremely nice and helpful, great breakfast choices in the morning, awesome pool, I think you get the picture! If you stay here, you will not be disappointed! We love the pool and our kids really do! Since we discovered the Lynina Inn last summer, we won't stay anywhere else in Branson! Our expectations were greatly exceeded on our first visit and it is due to the impression of that stay that the Lynina Inn will continue to earn our business! : )

Reviews.Title: “WONDERFUL!!!”
Reviews.Author: Amy C
Reviews.Content: Our family has been staying at the Lynina Inn for around 7 years and it is a wonderful place to stay. Christian owned and operated, the Lynina Inn is outstandingly clean, the staff is friendly and always remembers our family. The free breakfast gets better every year! They have eggs, waffles, cereal, toast, pastries, and juice...so many options! The maid makes special "animals" out of the towels for our kids and they love it! We also get chocolates! They have refrigerators in every room which is great so we don't have to keep an ice chest in the room. The pool is refreshing and always clean. We can't say enough about how wonderful our stay has always been at the Lynina Inn and we will continue to stay there every year. They will bend backwards to help you find great ticket prices for your Branson entertainment too. This is the best place to stay in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Clean Clean Clean”
Reviews.Author: Chris F
Reviews.Content: The cleanest room I've ever stayed in period. The first thing I do when I check into a room is look for evidence that other people have stayed there too, LOL, especially the bathroom and shower. I've stayed here three times, 10 days last summer, 3 days a couple months ago, and another 10 days just recently, I looked and looked and could find no fault with this wonderful place, yeah, I'm a "germ freak"! I've stayed all over our Blessed Nation in some of the supposedly finest Hotels, but there housekeeping services don't hold a candle to the people that work here. Stay here, stay here, stay here !!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Can't Ask for More”
Reviews.Author: David J
Reviews.Content: Great motel in Branson, MO. Just got back from 4 day/3 night stay. Motel was clean, comfortable and the staff very helpful. You will not get more for your money in Branson. The Lynina is on our list for our next visit!

Reviews.Title: “Just Average”
Reviews.Author: Go24win
Reviews.Content: The room was clean and staff was friendly and helpful. Some rooms have small refrigerators and flat screen TVs and other do not. The property does not have an elevator. Breakfast is ok, but nothing special. Had trouble regulating the AC. It was either too cold or too hot. I would rate the property as average. If you are looking for an average hotel with a reasonable price, this property is just that.

Reviews.Title: “Great great at a great price!”
Reviews.Author: Gmma58
Reviews.Content: The room was very clean, bed was comfy, we had a microwave & frige, noise level was not bad. The hot breakfast was very good! We will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great little inn, family friendly”
Reviews.Author: bassman4jesus
Reviews.Content: We just got back from a 3day/2night stay at Lynina. We chose this little inn following recommendations from Tripadvisor and all those recommendations sure did not disappoint. In fact, we enjoyed the stay so much I decided to add my 2-cents. First of all, the location is great. It is on the Blue route in Branson (you could go to just about anywhere on the strip via the Blue route, instead of fighting traffic on 76), and only about 7 miles from Silver Dollar City. Secondly, for the money, it is hard to beat - comfortable king-sized bed w/ a fridge & microwave, clean pool complete with pool toy for our children, and FREE hot breakfast (decent variety,and they slightly vary the menus each morning). They also had a nice little note welcoming the guests, complete with some complimentary toiletries (e.g. deodorant, sample shampoos, travel toothpaste, etc). All the staff was super-friendly, it's almost like they truly love working there. From now on, unless we're going to Branson for a waterpark weekend, we will definitely go back to Lynina.

Reviews.Title: “Another wonderful stay!”
Reviews.Author: misty s
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here when we got married, we return a few weeks ago with our kiddos. We stayed in the double jacuzzi room, next to the pool. Once again, we LOVED it. We will only stay there when in Branson. Everyone is friendly, rooms are very clean. Hot free breakfast is great. They have the BEST waffles! I loved the fluffy pillows too! I would recommend to EVERYONE! Thanks, Misty and Steven Scott

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful!!”
Reviews.Author: Kschulte8706
Reviews.Content: My husband and I stayed here last week. It is a very nice place to stay. Very clean, friendly staff, and a good free breakfast. We had a jacuzzi suite and were very impressed with the price. Very affordable. The only complaint we had was the wifi wasn't very good. But that wasnt a big deal. The location was good. Not right on the strip is a good thing! Thanks! We will stay there next time we head to branson! Karyn s. Godfrey il.

Reviews.Title: “Fun loving family”
Reviews.Author: tweetie51
Reviews.Content: WOW! What can we say? It's a great place to stay! Very friendly and informative. Breakfast was awesome and Shelly bakes and serves the waffles/syrup to your table. Comfortable, clean rooms and more importantly, located on the red route which is not on the "busiest" street in town. Very reasonably priced and demands a "comeback!" Thank you all!

Reviews.Title: “Our visit with Lynina Inn”
Reviews.Author: riding granpa h
Reviews.Content: Room was clean ,service with a smile very helpful any questions we had were answered with a smile. Thanks for your help. Bill & Maudine

Reviews.Title: “Quiet, comfortable lodging!”
Reviews.Author: TravlnGMa
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Lynina Inn for 5 nights recently and enjoyed the friendly staff and the "almost-home" breakfasts each day! The most important feature was how quiet the area was because it is set back from the main road. Also, it seemed like the guests were older -- probably because it was May and school was still in session, and there was no running back and forth down the outside hallway! That was a big plus!!

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: Wendy D
Reviews.Content: Lynina Inn is in a great location on the red route, quick access to everything. The room was very clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful. The breakfast that was included in the reasonably priced room is a nice addition to a great place to stay!!

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Jeff S
Reviews.Content: My wife and I decided to hit Branson on a whim. We got the package deal through the Tourist Office. The Lynina Inn was one of the hotels offered in the package, and I'm glad it was. It was an excellent hotel. The room was clean and well furnished. I guess a mini fridge and microwave would be nice in the double queen rooms, but we can live without them for a few days also. We have already decided to come to Branson again, and will stay at the Lynina Inn. The owner was very nice, walking around the breakfast room, talking with people, asking if everything is alright. We had a nice little chat with her. I wish them all the best, and hope to see them again soon.

Reviews.Title: “Family owned!”
Reviews.Author: Dawn L
Reviews.Content: We love staying at Lynina Inn the staff is very friendly and very clean. They have a homemade continental breakfest that is very inviting. I recommend everyone to stay there just off the strip, nice and quiet location. but very convient to get around.

Reviews.Title: “Lynina Inn in Branson is our home away from home.”
Reviews.Author: Janice S
Reviews.Content: The Lynina Inn is our "home away from home" when we travel to Branson. We usually go to Branson at least three times a year and that's the only place we will stay. The rooms are beautifully furnished and very clean and the staff are very friendly and helpful. The Inn has a lovely pool, with palm tree decor and lighting, making it very inviting. Henry and Ginger, the owners treat everyone like family and offer their customers a delicious and extensive breakfast. No need to go to IHOP--it's all here!

Reviews.Title: “Lynina is a great place to stay in Branson!”
Reviews.Author: jayhawkgrant
Reviews.Content: We keep coming back to Lynina time after time on our weekend trips to Branson. Always clean rooms, great customer service, and a WONDERFUL breakfast. Very affordable and located near everything. Would recommend to anyone. Give em a try!

Reviews.Title: “Lynina is simply the best!”
Reviews.Author: dhbh92
Reviews.Content: We've stayed at Lynina Inn 5 or 6 times now and wouldn't think of staying anywhere else. If you want to stay where the rooms are clean, the beds are super comfortable and has the friendliest staff in Branson, this is the place for you. All that for a good price and WAFFLES too!!!

Reviews.Title: “Branson's best kept secret”
Reviews.Author: donald7948
Reviews.Content: Branson's best kept secret just got better. I am now happy to report the addition of new refrigerators and flat screen TV's. The room was very clean as always with the addition of new pillow top beds. I gotta say this bed was better then my king size bed at home and if you have stayed in hotels you know that's a biggie. Ginger and the staff are always friendly. Staying here is like staying with a relative in another state. You won't be disappointed staying here enjoy.

Reviews.Title: “Our new place to stay in Branson”
Reviews.Author: Ginger B
Reviews.Content: Very clean, great price, great location, and very friendly staff...

Reviews.Title: “An OK place to stay”
Reviews.Author: QAnnBan
Reviews.Content: The room was clean but dated. The breakfast was poor- rubber egg pucks, two choices of cereal. Friendly staff. OK location. Quiet.

Reviews.Title: “We would stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: misty s
Reviews.Content: My Husband and I are currently staying here, and are about to check out. We LOVED LOVED LOVED it here. The room was very neat and clean, with cute little towel figures, and an awesome jacuzzi. We told the front desk that we had just gotten married and when we returned we had a cute bottle of raspberry juice with 2 wine glasses and a card congratulating us. We thought that was a sweet little touch. It was nice and quiet. Everyone was friendly, The hot breakfast was very good. A lot better than any others I have had in the past. I would definitely stay here again! The rate was very good for the room that they gave us. Awesome experience! Misty and Steven Scott

Reviews.Title: “Lynina Inn”
Reviews.Author: Charlie C
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent place to stay in Branson if you're looking for clean inexpensive lodging with great service. The staff is helpful, the rooms are comfortable, and we can't emphasize enough how clean the property is. Even the complimentary continental breakfast is good. Lynina Inn is a great value. Charlie & Chris Clark

Reviews.Title: “Just what we ordered "relaxation".”
Reviews.Author: Dick W
Reviews.Content: Very clean and lovely place. The staff is excellent.

Reviews.Title: “Will stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: SanditeMom
Reviews.Content: My husband and i stayed at Lynina Inn over Labor Day weekend. It was just a getaway for us - no kids! We had no trouble making the reservation and the rate was very reasonable. We had to change rooms during our stay, but they told us to just pack up our stuff and they would move it for us while we were out. They did this and it was very convienent! The location is perfect and it was clean, clean, CLEAN! The breakfast was more than expected! I was excited to see made to order waffles and since I'm picky about mine, I got it just like I wanted! Several times during out stay my husband and I commented that we would stay here again with or without the kids. We didn't get to try the pool, but it looked beautiful and clean. Thanks for a wonderful stay and we will be back!

Reviews.Title: “Great experience!”
Reviews.Author: shedawg
Reviews.Content: VERY clean room, nice clear pool, very friendly staff!! Chose to stay here based on reviews on this site-good choice! Good rates for a basic but extremely clean room with little extras thrown in. The samples of toothpaste and hair gels, the better than average soaps and shampoo provided, plenty of towels, towels provided at pool etc. Also, they are one of a few that still offer smoking rooms which I appreciated and found to be much more pleasant than most such offerings. The expanded continental breakfast was very good--biscuits and gravy(tasted home-made!) and freshly made waffles along with cereal, juices, donuts, bagels/cream cheese, toast, English muffins, milk ,coffee or tea. Pool and surrounding area were very clean and open till 11pm. The only drawback I saw personally, was the traffic noise at the pool area, though It is shielded from view by a row of trees. I live in a rural area, so am not used to the traffic noise - it may be a non- issue for most. All in all a very pleasant stay and I would recommend this place to anyone who wants cleanliness, value and friendly service.Thank you!

Reviews.Title: “Average and had to haggle over extra day room charge”
Reviews.Author: jatt77
Reviews.Content: I heard many good reviews of this hotel and had high hopes. However as usual things aren't always as they seem. The hotel looks good from a distance but when you look close you realize it's an older hotel that recently had siding put on it. This is proven when you go in the room. The room had a distinct hotel smell as well as an undersized TV on the desk, average. We were unsure if we would be staying a second day, which we communicated to the front desk. It turned out we didn't stay the second day and "attempted" to checkout at 3:30 am bc of our 6am flight and rental car return. Since there was nobody at the desk we left our "lone" key on the dresser in room and left to catch our plane. We called later in the afternoon to tell them we wouldn't be staying the second night. We were offered a "compromise" on the second night's fees which I refused so the Lynina charged us full price for the second night even though we "checked out 3:30 am that morning. Needless to say I wasn't happy about this at all. Part of this occurred bc we actually changed our first reservation "without incident" even though I was unable to reach anybody at the hotel after 11:30 pm for a hotel that supposedly operates 24 hours. Finally when I setup the reservation I was told it would be $59 and it turned out to be $66. I was told that there was Kanakuk discount but when I told the person running the Front Desk about the discount about it he said he didn't know anything about it and we received no discount.

Reviews.Title: “Best Breakfast in 8-10 years....”
Reviews.Author: Istayforfun
Reviews.Content: I just returned from Branson and could not wait to write a review of this hotel. I had never stayed here before and used the reviews that I read here to make my chose. The rooms were very clean, and I normally will not rent a room without looking at it first. So I was a little nervous, but there was nothing to be nervous about. The staff was friendly. The pool area was clean and well kept. Our room was a nonsmoking and did not have any type of smell to it at all. The freebees left in the room was a nice touch. The bed was firm as some others have commented. The only thing I seen that was not to my likings was the back stairs were in need of repair. The had rust on them, but all in all the stay was very pleasent. I loved the cards at the front office and in the rooms about how to give you heart to Jesus and let him be Lord of your life. My son who is 8 years old said, " That the breakfast was the best breakfast that he had ate in the last 8 to 10 years". He's 8. I did have to laugh about that. In fact he said that was the best thing he did on our trip was the breakfast. I will stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely the best Motel in Branson!!”
Reviews.Author: dstarkov
Reviews.Content: This was our second trip to Branson and we would not stay anywhere but at Lynina Inn. It is always clean and quiet. The employees and the owner of Lynina Inn believe strongly in customer service. I can't say enough good things about this place.

Reviews.Title: “CLEAN & FRIENDLY!!”
Reviews.Author: LoveBoxerDogs
Reviews.Content: We are currently staying at the Lynina Inn and although I can't complain at all about the cleanliness and friendly staff, the beds are rock hard! I've had trouble sleeping because of this. My husband is sleeping like a log (even now!) and also believes the beds are hard, but not enough to lose sleep over. I, on the other hand, toss and turn and even put pillows under my legs when lying on my side. The room rate, cleanliness, and friendly staff are excellent qualities the Lynina Inn possesses, but I don't know if I would stay again because of the incredible firmness of the bed. I'm sure there are many people who like a very firm bed, but for those of you, like me, who don't, this might not be the place for you.

Reviews.Title: “Stayed here 7 times in 2010!”
Reviews.Author: jillywilly17
Reviews.Content: I thought the rooms were clean and the price was right. The staff was always great to talk to,they always remembered my name and that means something! I brought my whole family here and never heard a bad word about our stay. Will be back in the future.

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back for sure”
Reviews.Author: Pinkgemm
Reviews.Content: We choose this Inn because of the good reviews here at tripadvisor and you guys are absolutely right. Our room was ultra clean, A/C was great and friendly staffs. This is home( in Branson) away from home.

Reviews.Title: “If you're staying in Branson, this is the place.”
Reviews.Author: PSB2008
Reviews.Content: We drove from Oklahoma and met family coming from Kansas. What a wonderful friendly staff. Both rooms were very clean (tub and shower also) and smelled good. We even requested a Frig. and Micro to be added in our room. The breakfast was awesome, just like being at home. This is the only place we will stay when coming to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Great friendly place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: maiar_nj
Reviews.Content: Family oriented, very clean. Everyone associated with the hotel was very very friendly and helpful. Rooms were very clean and confortable. Close to everything. Price was right, Good free buffet in the morning.

Reviews.Title: “Love, Love this hotel !!!”
Reviews.Author: nannyhoney
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent two nights at the Lynina and absolutely loved it. The rooms were clean and the beds were so comfortable. The staff made us feel so welcome and at home. We loved eating breakfast there and meeting other travelers. I can honestly say I don't know when I've ever stayed at a hotel that made me look so forward to returning. If you go to Branson this is the hotel to stay in. Theres no frills or thrills just a spotless clean place to stay and the feeling of coming home. Thank you Ginger for making our stay so wonderful. We'll be back many times!!!

Reviews.Title: “FABULOUS, CAN'T WAIT TO STAY AGAIN!”
Reviews.Author: keisman
Reviews.Content: The staff was amazing, so friendly~truly treated you like a friend! The room was remarkably clean, you could honestly tell they take pride in their business! Can not wait to stay again! (more than just ONE thumbs up)

Reviews.Title: “Great get-away”
Reviews.Author: pianoplayerla
Reviews.Content: We were visiting Branson in the "off" season and looking for a good location. We chose The Lynina Inn based on reviews on Trip Advisor. We were not disappointed!! I called the Inn and told them we were coming to Branson to celebrate our 30th wedding anniversary. They fixed us up with a very 'quiet' room with king size bed, microwave & fridge for a very reasonable price. We were right next door to a smoking room and NEVER smelled the first hint of smoke in our room. Thank you!!! There was a very nice continental breakfast in the mornings with plenty of room for guests to sit and eat. Thank you Lynina Inn for making my husband's first visit to Branson in 28 years a memorable one. We will be back!!!

Reviews.Title: “Owner takes pride in her property”
Reviews.Author: donald7948
Reviews.Content: Very clean, friendly staff, owner takes pride in her property,awesome breakfast including homemade waffles, biscuits and gravy. Beds were firm the internet was strong. My Wife said the rooms needed a fridge, only drawback..I would return.

Reviews.Title: “What are you looking for?”
Reviews.Content: IF you want a clean, friendly, cheap place to stay; This is it! The rooms are small and lack irons, boards, closets, and updated furniture. The staff is super friendly and the place is A+ clean. IF you plan on very minimal time at the motel, you will most likely find Lynina attractive. IF you want a modern place and several anemities, the answer is No. The location is off of Hwy 76 which is a plus.

Reviews.Title: “Grrrrreat!!!!!!!! We will be back”
Reviews.Author: spoplin
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stayed in one of the jacuzzi rooms with a king size bed at the end of October. We could not have been any happier with our choice to stay at the Lynina Inn. First off the day and night staff were all very friendly, helpful and eager to do anything that they could to help make our stay and vacation in Branson as enjoyable as possible. The rooms were clean, nice and well kept. The jacuzi was large enough for two and just what we needed each day after a lot of walking at Silver Dollar City and other sites. The location was convenient yet quiet and away from all the traffic on 76 Country Blvd. The Continental Breakfast was better than most that I have seen in quality and variety and even had someone making waffles to order. The price was low but the quality was high in all respects. We will gladly come back to the Lynina on future trips to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, Comfortabe, Resonable”
Reviews.Author: emo3f2
Reviews.Content: 2 night stay. Great Location just about a mile from all the shows, shopping, etc. Very friendly, very clean, quiet. Going back soon.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel-excellent staff”
Reviews.Author: emytnik
Reviews.Content: My husband & I just returned from Branson where we spent 3 nights at Lynina Inn. We were so very satisfied with EVERYTHING about this hotel: staff with friendly & helpful, morning breakfast was more than adequate, rooms were clean and comfortable- especially the beds! Ginger and her staff made it all a very pleasant experience and we definitely would stay here again!!

Reviews.Title: “We'll be back!!!”
Reviews.Author: Phillips107
Reviews.Content: We selected the Lynina Inn due to the last amount of positive reviews and we agree, it's the place to stay. We were celebrating our 25th Anniversary, staying 6 nights, and didn't want to leave. I'm already missing those fresh HOT waffles every morning. LOL

Reviews.Title: “Best place we've ever stayed at in Branson”
Reviews.Author: mikang10
Reviews.Content: I cannot say enough about the wonderful time we had in Branson this time due in part to the good treatment we experienced at Lynina Inn. Ginger and her staff could not have been more helpful to make our stay a never forgotten experience. The rooms were wonderful, the breakfast was good, and more than that, the staff was, without doubt, the best we have ever encountered in all the years we've been coming to Branson. We will definitely stay here every time we travel to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Clean place for good price.”
Reviews.Author: MOButterfly
Reviews.Content: We have stayed in Branson many times and always enjoyed our time there. We decided to try the Lynina Motel based on reviews from "Advisor." The staff at this motel is extremely friendly and very helpful. They really try to please the customer. We found the room to be very clean and surprised at the ample amount of towels and cloths available at all times. Breakfast is adequate. This is not a hotel for "frills" and is VERY basic so if you need the little extras this is probably not for you. If you just need a place to sleep (beds are very comfortable) then check this one out. For the most, the room was quiet for sleeping, however, until people get settled in right after shows and in the mornings, things can get a bit noisy. Prices were very reasonable.

Reviews.Title: “OUTSTANDING EXPERIENCE!!! Thank you all - Ginger, Amber & Mr. Bill”
Reviews.Author: RAAColumbus_Ohio
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Lynina was without a doubt the best part of our Branson experience. First time visit to Branson we took in 6 shows in three days which we enjoyed but the Lynina crew of owner Ginger, Amber and Mr. Bill (Waffle King) made it a great experience. It reminded me of my best travel days as a road warrior (construction equipment sales over 30 years on the road) especially in North Dakota where everybody is your friend and almost like family. Thanks again! CAT MAN from Central Ohio - RAA

Reviews.Title: “There is nothing bad to say about this place- and I'm picky!”
Reviews.Author: blueskies954
Reviews.Content: I had to give this place an "excellent" rating in every category! The room was great, the location was excellent, the service was terrific, and the value was very good. What more could you want? And yes....I am very picky! I would definitely stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Great Budget Hotel - Very Clean, Good Breakfast, Courteous.......”
Reviews.Author: CKD63
Reviews.Content: After reading the glowing reviews on Trip Advisor I booked two adjoining rooms at the Lynina Inn. We were traveling to Branson with my 80 year old father and his 80 year old girlfriend. The hotel was great, clean, good breakfast (not fancy but good), and a good value at $59 a night. The only problem we had was that we requested ajoining rooms and my father and his girlfriend had a hard time climbing the stairs to get to the rooms. That was not the hotel's fault. Just something to keep in mind if you have older people traveling with you. One other thing that could be improved on is the breakfast times. 7am to 9am is a little on the short side. 7am to 10am would be better. Overall, I would gladly recommend this hotel to any of my friends and family traveling to Branson. I think it would be hard to find a better value.

Reviews.Title: “Third Stay”
Reviews.Author: bettymason
Reviews.Content: Two stays before were GREAT. However this time we took our "Church Pastor" son & his family for a relaxed and fun weekend to a motel we felt would give him the much needed relaxation. On the second morning a problem arose with one of our grandchildren and the manager humilated our son in front of everyone in the lobby eating breakfast concerning the grandchild. I AGREE the problem should have been addressed, but not in public. This put a great stress on the entire family for the duration of our "family relaxed & fun weekend". The other attendances were more than great!!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Friendly, Clean, Service with a Smile!”
Reviews.Author: annie44160
Reviews.Content: The best thing about Lynina was the friendly people that own and work there. Everyone seemed happy and willing to go the extra mile. Our family reunion was very well taken care of. Not far from any attraction. Nice pool was appreciated by many. The air conditioned meeting room our group was able to congregate in between activities was a real blessing. Ginger and her staff were very much the highlight of our stay at Lynina. They deserve a very high rating.

Reviews.Title: “Glad we stayed here.”
Reviews.Author: JalenafromMichigan
Reviews.Content: Nice reasonably priced hotel. Very decent free breakfast in lobby. They'll even make you a homemade waffle while you wait. The pool was clean. Beds were comfy [pillow top mattresses]. The air conditioning units in the rooms were awesome - very easy to adjust. Friendly staff who are eager to help you if you should need anything. Me and my husband, and our 3 young boys, really liked it at Lynina. We called ahead and asked for a refrigerator and microwave to be in room, and they were hooked up and ready to go when we arrived. That was very helpful with little children who always need something to eat/drink every few hours. We stayed for 6 nights and paid only 420.00 [that's including the rental of the fridge and microwave]. For the price, we got a lot of bang for our buck. One more nice thing about Lynina Inn was that it wasn't located on the main drag [76]. It was nice to have accommodations on a quieter, less busy street. Thanks to the staff for running the motel so well. Good job. :D

Reviews.Title: “Affordable and clean”
Reviews.Author: scase
Reviews.Content: I will say this hotel is affordable and clean but they lack adequate parking. We stayed 4 nights and a couple of nights we came back to our room rather late (11:30 p.m.) and there were no more parking spaces. I was also a little perturbed when we slept in one morning and arrived for breakfast at about 9:35 a.m. (they serve till 10:00 a.m.) and we were greeted with a hello and the waffle iron is already off. Before we were even done eating they had put almost everything up. If you are going to serve breakfast till 10:00 a.m. then serve it till then. Ironing boards and irons would be a big plus if added to the rooms too. Otherwise, the beds were new and the rooms quite clean.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Affordable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: KAHLJH
Reviews.Content: If you're looking for a clean, basic hotel room to stay in while you're out doing other things most of the time, then this is a great place ot stay! There's nothing fancy about this place, but we had no complaints at all. It was very clean, the staff was very friendly and welcoming and the free breakfast wasn't bad at all. The kids liked the pool area with its fake palm trees and lights all around.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel staff~wonderful beds!!”
Reviews.Author: Tootsie1969
Reviews.Content: Stayed in this hotel for five days couldn't have felt more at home. The front desk staff is awesome, good breakfast, clean rooms and wonderful beds. Great price would stay here again :) Close to so much and easy to get around without the traffic on 76!!!

Reviews.Title: “When in Branson, don't stay anywhere else but Lynina!”
Reviews.Author: dhbh92
Reviews.Content: What can I say about Lynina Inn that hasn't already been written. It truely is as clean as everyone says, reasonably priced and in a great location. But what really makes Lynina special is their staff. They're friendly, knowledgable about all things Branson and willing to do anything they can to help you enjoy your stay. I've been there 3 times and wouldn't stay anywhere else.

Reviews.Title: “FOUND A HOME IN BRANSON”
Reviews.Author: Jenn225
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Lynina Inn over Father's Day weekened. We picked the hotel because of the reviews on tripadvisor. The reveiws were right on. This hotel is as close to perfect as we have found in Branson. Perfect location to access all the attractions, rooms were perfectly cleans, the beds were extremely comfortable, the breakfast was good, the pool was extremely nice and they even leave you samples of different products in your room. we will definitely be making this our home away from home while in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding property”
Reviews.Author: clatham
Reviews.Content: Staff and owners are beyond nice. What a pleasure it was to stay there. Best bang for the buck by far in my humble opinion. Ultra clean, staff extremely helpful, I echo everything positive said here, review wise. I picked them based on what I read on Trip Advisor and it was a great choice. It was a lot of fun seeing the entertainers stop by at breakfast. I suggest that you add a small fridge for $10 for your entire length of stay if you need it, wear flip flops to the pool (pebble walkway around it is a little hard on the feet but you'll probably have it to yourself, SWEET!) and pick up their price list for tickets at the front desk and save some $$$.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel was fine”
Reviews.Author: sleeper72
Reviews.Content: We just stayed there one night, but everything was fine. The reception was great, the room was clean and confortable. We had our 8 yr old grandson with us and he loved the pool and the room. The breakfast was good, The waffles were great, the biscuits and gravy a bit salty. Entertainers from shows came around trying to drum up business and sang for us. Not a bad deal. I would recommend this motel

Reviews.Title: “Shh, Excellant Stay But I'd Prefer to Keep It That Way”
Reviews.Author: jwoge
Reviews.Content: The voice over the phone while making the reservations for our Deluxe King was friendly and when we arrived we found the owners just as friendly. Our room was very clean and for two gave us enough space. They offer a small choice for breakfast which is nice and was enough for us: waffles, cereal, hardboiled eggs, etc. For some reason I did have a problem sleeping all 3 nights but it wasn't from noise or uncomfortable beds so I can't explain it. The pool is small but clean and warm. All in all a surprisingly nice place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “good value”
Reviews.Author: mrswrightnmrwrong
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for our family vacation. We got a discount for finding it on the internet. Hotel rooms were very nice size and very clean. Bathrooms were very clean and to be honest a little small. Absolutely wonderful location. When you first visit the pool it seems a little small also but it ended up being perfect. 90% of the time we had the pool to ourselves and it was very clean. You can use the pool until 11pm and oh my its beautiful at night secluded with lit up palm trees and blue lighted water, dreamy!!! If you like biscuits and gravy and waffles its a great breakfast for free. I would recommend to anyone wanting a hotel not expecting a luxury hotel just wanting somewhere clean to stay on a budget.

Reviews.Title: “We'll be seeing you all soon in Branson”
Reviews.Author: reguzman20012001
Reviews.Content: Our stay at the Lynina Inn was wonderful. Everything was perfect. I took my mother, my sister and her kids to Branson for the first time in May. The staff at the Lynina Inn was friendly and considerate of our needs. The rooms were extremely clean and the beds were very comfortable. The front desk made it possible to have our two rooms side by side to each other for convenience. Besides a delicious complimentary continental breakfast, I was able to make fresh coffee every day and night in my room. They thought of everything. Waiting in our rooms, along with plenty of fresh towels, coffee, aspirin, there were complimentary sample size H.A.B.A. (Health and Beauty Aides) like toothpaste, shampoo and soaps. That was so helpful and thoughtful....and very much appreciated. You have no idea!!!! We can't wait to visit Branson again and we will definitely return to the Lynina Inn. Maybe when it gets hotter, I'll check out the pool. Oh, and thanks for the coupons. We saved a lot of money at the Wax museum. Cheers - Rita.

Reviews.Title: “Ultra Clean”
Reviews.Author: Kansascloud
Reviews.Content: I stayed here based on other reviews on Trip Advisor. The sign out front said, "Ultra Clean". Indeed it is! I would stay here again any time. Nice new HDTVs! The free wireless service worked flawlessly and was pretty fast. Really everything you need for a comfortable visit to Branson.

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Quiet”
Reviews.Author: Kristine57
Reviews.Content: We stayed from April 15-18. We selected the motel based on other Tripadvisor reviews. The motel is right off the main road but the area is very quiet, the rooms were clean, and there was a quick breakfast available in the mornings. The breakfast had a decent variety and had ready to make waffles and the biscuits and gravy were good. There was canned peaches available but no fresh fruit. We decided to go to the Dixie Stampede one evening and the lady at the front desk took our information and when we returned in the afternoon our vouchers were waiting for us. I would stay at this motel again because it was inexpensive, quiet, very clean, nice size rooms, good mattresses, and convenient drive to anywhere in Branson. The front desk people were all so nice.

Reviews.Title: “Outstanding”
Reviews.Author: winterh
Reviews.Content: Being our first time in Branson did not know what to expect of the Motels in the area. I will say that my wife and I were pleased with what we found when we arrived. The staff was very helpful and were willing to put in the extra effort to insure that your stay in Branson was as enjoyable as they could make it. The rooms were among the cleanest I have ever had in any motel I have stayed in. You have to go to the free breakfast and be prepared to laugh along with the person who makes the waffles. Will be looking to stay there again on our next trip, To the owners and staff of the Lynina Inn, well done in making us feel like friends and not just someone staying there.

Reviews.Title: “The best I have ever stayed at”
Reviews.Author: basgans
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for are 16 wedding anniversary, the staff was so very nice and very helpful. We did not have reservation, they where able to get us a King jacuzzi and when we came back to are room there was a gift basket waiting for us. We will be going back there.

Reviews.Title: “Lynina Inn a great place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Lindalight
Reviews.Content: Lynina Inn a great place to stay lindalight We were in Branso & in between timeshares & needed a hotel so I checked on trip advisor for a hotel for one night, this hotel got a great rating & a very good price. We stayed Thanksgiving day. The breakfast was great fresh waffels were made for us & brought to our table with syrup & utensils. This place is a good location & the front desk has very nice, polite & helpfull staff, everyone is very friendly. We were eating breakfast & preformers from some of the shows come in & tell about there shows & some times sing. If you need a nice hotel nothing fancy just a great place to stay you have to stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome stay”
Reviews.Author: JudArizona
Reviews.Content: My sister and I and our spouses spent four days at the Lynina Inn and we were thrilled with the room. It was cleaned daily and looked great! The breakfast that came with the room was very good. I can't say enough about the staff. We were made to feel very much at home there. We ordered tickets each day for the shows and they were delivered to the front desk with no problems. The price of the room is so reasonable and it is right around the corner from the main drag of town. Yet the hotel is located on a street that is very quiet. I highly recommend this hotel for great price, cleanliness and friendliness. Judy Russell

Reviews.Title: “Highly Recommended!!”
Reviews.Author: njdruk
Reviews.Content: This was our 2nd time staying at Lynina. We were so impressed the first time that it was our 1st choice when returning to the Branson area. What stood out the most was the customer service we received. Ginger and Amber were so kind and helpful. Both times we decided to extend our stay by a couple of days and they did whatever they had to in order to accomodate us. We especially enjoyed the free breakfast each day. Not only was the food good but we also enjoyed the entertainment people who came in everyday to hightlight their shows. We especially loved seeing the Neil Diamond guy! And Bill, the waffle maker, was a morning show himself. The rooms were very clean and the beds were quite comfortable. Still can't believe we found such a wonderfu place at such a reasonable rate.

Reviews.Title: “Agreement on value”
Reviews.Author: Tweentrails
Reviews.Content: We just stayed at the Lynina Inn and I'm pleased to see that others had an experience similar to outs. The Lynina is not an AAA-listed hotel but is in the range of AAA's cheaper listings. The rooms are well kept, the staff is especially friendly and well-informed, and the free breakfast is a cut above some others. We would certainly stay there again. They could, however, improve security. We felt safe in the location and had no problems but the door had no guard chain and the locks still use keys rather than key cards.

Reviews.Title: “Extremely Good Value!”
Reviews.Author: dorsalmo
Reviews.Content: This hotel is one of the cheapest in Branson, but for quality it ranks up with hotels which cost twice as much. We couldn't believe the value. It has all the things you expect in a decent hotel - clean, basic amenities, good service - and more. The complimentary breakfast they provide is as good as any we've had. The people are very friendly. They provide free wireless Internet. The Christian atmosphere in the establishment is not overdone, but refreshing. Add to all this that it's well-located close to pretty-much everything in Branson. Not bad for about $50 a night, eh?

Reviews.Title: “lynina inn southern hospitality at its best”
Reviews.Author: santara
Reviews.Content: My friend and I went to Branson in August to see concerts by the Cowsills at the RFD Theatre. I had read reviews on the Lynina Inn and they were good so we stayed there. It was a nice relaxing hotel. The staff greeted us cheerfully and welcoming. We were early and our room was not ready but they said they would call once it became available so we could check in. Once we checked in the room was of a good size and the beds were 2 double beds which I had requested. There was a snack machine near the room. There was a free breakfast included which included biscuits and gravy, cereal, fresh fruit and a very nice man who makes waffles for you. I spilled my orange juice and the very friendly owner cleaned it up for me. They offer lots of brochures and flyers of the entertainment in Branson. I will definitely stay there again. i couldnt ask for anything more. The price was reasonable too.

Reviews.Title: “Lynina Inn Delivers”
Reviews.Author: Sonnygone
Reviews.Content: With winning smiles and sincere hearts the entire staff of Lynina Inn made our three, night stay a memorable experience. We left the RV scene with fond memories after, reduced travel made the hotel option more attractive. Internet research paid off big when we came up with Lynina Inn as, THE place for us to stay in Branson. Indeed, Lynina Inn was a large part of a most enjoyable visit. Lynina Inn delivers, as advertised on their web site. Where will we stay on our next trip to Branson? We would not consider staying anywhere else. P.S. There is little doubt that, all of the kind words others have written about them are true.

Reviews.Title: “DOWNHOME COMFORTABLE STAY”
Reviews.Author: vamcana
Reviews.Content: Been going to Branson for 40+ years. My first time of staying at Lynina. Have stayed at many motels. Lynina is at the top. The staff Ginger, the girls at the front desk and Bill the waffle maker make you feel right at home. I was alone for the first time visiting Branson so I wanted to feel safe and I did. No worries! They were so helpful in many ways. I ordered show tickets through them and they were delivered to the lobby for pickup which made it so convenient. The rooms were very clean, the parking lot was well lit and also clean along with the pool area. I enjoyed breakfast every morning with the staff and looked forward to it. The waffles and coffee were excellent. They made me feel very welcome and like I was visiting with my friends. I felt at home. Looking forward to going back to Branson with my husband and staying at Lynina. Can't wait to bring him there.

Reviews.Title: “The Best Value in Branson. Great Place To Stay”
Reviews.Author: tmmlump1
Reviews.Content: We had 2 rooms and our family ages were from 3 to 74. Lets start with the staff. EVERYONE was super friendly and helpful. The rooms were extremely clean. My kids used the pool every night and it was spotless. The breakfast was very good, the dining area was nice. The staff helped us out with a local company that offered discounted show tickets delivered right to the hotel. We will stay here again on our next visit. It really could not have been a better stay. 3 thumbs up to Ginger and the crew of Lynina Inn Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Great Value, Clean, Overall Winner!”
Reviews.Author: MinervaJK
Reviews.Content: This was our first family trip to Branson. We looked up the reviews and decided that Lynina would be a safe bet for the money. What we didn't realize was that it was an incredible value! The friendly young man who checked us in set the tone for the stay. Our room was spotless, comfortable, and exactly what we expected. There was a handy folder of local information, coffee, and more towels than we could use in a week. The breakfast was lovely and there was quite a friendly character making the waffles. My toddler was enchanted and cleaned her plate. There was free wi-fi and a computer in the breakfast area for a quick mapquest look-up.The location is "off-strip" so no painful waits to get onto the road, and it was still very close to everything we wanted to do. When we came back from a long day our room was just as clean as when we first checked in. There were no surprises at check out. There are 1000's of hotels in Branson, many of which look cute from the road, but as we past them we knew we had chosen the pick of the litter. If you are looking for a sweet little place where you get a lot for your buck I would choose Lynina. When we go back that's where we'll stay!

Reviews.Title: “Absolutely the Best”
Reviews.Author: hokiewife
Reviews.Content: Ditto all the other reviews Loved the location. You don't have to go to the infamous Highway 76 strip which is a blessing.It was convenient to everything. The motel and pool is SUPER clean and well maintained.It may not have all the" bells and whistles "of a big chain but It is a small motel, family owned and reasonably priced. The staff was WONDERFUL ,especially Bill, the waffle maker. I am an early riser sooo Bill and i had some great conversations while i waited on my family to wake up. Large rooms,comfortable beds,quiet and a very good breakfast Wish there had been a hot tub but that's being picky(grin) We had a wonderful week there

Reviews.Title: “Clean and Friendly”
Reviews.Author: CooknMomma
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at Lynina Inn. Two things I would change. Our room needed a new mattress. It was ok for the first couple nights but 4 nights made my back sore. Also they need a high chair in the breakfast area. Everything else was great! Friendly staff, very clean inside and out. Pool nice.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Stay...Outstanding in Every Way!”
Reviews.Author: TripmomLedgewood_NJ
Reviews.Content: Earlier this month, we spent 8 nights at the Lynina Inn; we could not have been more pleased with the cleanliness, hospitality, and facilities provided. This is a family-run business and pride of ownership is clearly apparent. It is located less than a mile from "The Strip" and is convenient to a variety of theaters, restaurants and other attractions. For those who are familiar with Branson, another major plus is that the parking lot is level! The complimentary breakfast is substantial and includes biscuits, sausage gravy, waffles, cereal, bagels, pastries, etc.; we certainly enjoyed Bill, the waffle maker, every morning! Our 3 children had a great time at the pool! We feel that we received excellent value for our money and have already discussed plans to return next summer!

Reviews.Title: “Super Staff and Motel”
Reviews.Author: rammjet
Reviews.Content: Stayed for 3 nights starting 28 June 2008. Staff was super and room was clean. Mr. Bill, who serves the homemade waffles for breakfast was great. Included all you would need. He entertained like a Branson show. Ginger was a super host and took care of us. They even gave us a special gift for our 25th Anniversary. Room was clean and everyone made you feel like you were at home. Also gave discounts and good advice on shows. Will definately go back next trip.

Reviews.Title: “Great service and location.”
Reviews.Author: nursepatSt_Louis
Reviews.Content: My sister and I stayed here for three nights. Being two women traveling on our own, we felt very safe and well cared for by the hotel staff. Great breakfast, clean rooms, nice pool, fair price, friendly folks and the coldest air conditioning I've ever had in a motel room, which was a good thing since we stayed during the recent heat wave, one day it was 101.Keep up the good work staff and owners, I will tell everyone I know what a pleasant, relaxing time I had in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Great place . we will be back !”
Reviews.Author: ArnoldMoCutter
Reviews.Content: The Lynina was worth every dime . The place is very clean . The staff is outstanding . The check in and out was smooth and fast . The free breakfast was a pleasent surprise . Bob , ( the waffle guy) starts your day off with a joke and a smile .

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to Stay! Perfect in Every WAY!!”
Reviews.Author: ms39046
Reviews.Content: Great place to stay, clean and breakfast is fantastic! Love Bill the waffle man!! He makes breakfast fun and just wonderful!! Owners are awesome! Great room, quiet and one of the best places we have stayed in a long time, and we travel all the time! Will never stay anywhere else while in Branson!

Reviews.Title: “Very impressed”
Reviews.Author: mrsozarkrooster
Reviews.Content: I recently attended the Open House that The Lynina Inn hosted. I was very impressed by the cleanliness of the rooms. I have seen several of the areas hotel/motel rooms and The Lynina Inn has been by far one of the cleanest places I have seen.The staff was very gracious and friendly. They was most helpful in answering any questions I had. I would definitly recomend The Lynina Inn to my family and friends that come to Branson to visit. I think their rates are competitive and the "off the main strip" location but still being close to the strip and all Branson shows and attractions is an added bonus.

Reviews.Title: “If your cheap like me, but still like quality...this is the place for you.”
Reviews.Author: GoatHeadband
Reviews.Content: -The room was cleaner than many more expensive hotels I have stayed at. -The Continental Breakfast was excellent. Bill, the guy who ran the breakfast, was very proud of what he had to offer. He was fun to talk with. -Everyone employee we talked to seemed to enjoy working there. You don't see that enough at hotels. -For the price you really won't find much better than this.

Reviews.Title: “The Lynina could be Branson's "Best kept Secret"”
Reviews.Author: core130
Reviews.Content: The staff were professional and friendly, the rooms immaculate, breakfast was good AND hot, and there was plenty of it! The folks who own the Lynina live on the property and make every effort to make their guests feel at home. Of the 163+ lodging facilities available our party of 4 found this Inn well above standards, one of the best. The owners and staff are just super! Many thanks to Amber (great personality) and oh yes Bill (who takes Coffee brewing to the next level)..

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice!!!”
Reviews.Author: RoadstarMan
Reviews.Content: Had an excellent experience staying at the Lynina Inn. Our room was very nice and equipped with all the comforts of home. Pool is very well maintained along with all the other amenities this place has to offer. There is a complimentary breakfast with a wide assortment of choices to please everyone along with a large dining area to accommodate all. While in Branson we went to one show and to Silver Dollar City with the kids, the staff at Lynina Inn was able to offer us huge discounts at both locations that saved our family a lot of money. Would highly recommend staying here, the staff and owners go that extra mile to assure your stay here is perfect.

Reviews.Title: “Will definitely stay here again!”
Reviews.Author: Dupy
Reviews.Content: My husband and I and my brother-in-law just spent two nights here and were very impressed. The price of the rooms was very affordable. The owners and staff were extremely friendly. The facility was extra clean and very comfortable. The free breakfast was above average and was held in a clean and fresh atmosphere. The location of the hotel was perfect and we felt very safe here. We will definitely stay at the Lynina Inn again.

Reviews.Title: “WOW”
Reviews.Author: TraverlerE
Reviews.Content: We could not have been more pleased. The day clerk at the registration desk was as friendly, helpful and courteous as anyone we have ever dealt with. Room was very clean. Beds very comfortable. Breakfast outstanding for a continental including fresh waffles and biscuits and gravy mmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmmm. We left feeling they surely cared for their guest. Will definitely stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Clean & Friendly”
Reviews.Author: Stroike
Reviews.Content: Nice place to stay, room was well kept and clean. Staff was very friendly and accommodating. The breakfast was good, great sausage gravy & biscuits, waffles too. Will stay there again. Stroike"s Ok.

Reviews.Title: “Nice, Clean, So-so”
Reviews.Author: travelingtraveler95
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for the weekend, and chose this motel as it was one of the only ones with vacancy at the time of our booking. The rooms were very nicely kept and clean, and the staff was excellent and friendly. The pool area was nice, too. The problem with the room was that there were no hair dryers, coffee makers in room, refrigerator, microwave, shampoo, or a clock! None of the rooms had these. The breakfast wasn't that great. It had english muffins, cake donuts, and cereal. I was disappointed that there was no fresh fruit. It did have home made biscuits and gravy, which was great. The location was nice too. I also understand that the hotel was recently sold and will be under new ownership, so maybe things will change.

HotelInfo.Name: Lynina Inn
HotelInfo.Address: 2772 Shepherd of the Hills Expwy, Branson, MO 65616
